sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_1eaec8b52fd03010732c4ae72799b691
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ShURLy</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Functions for the ShURLy -- the URL shortener.</description><name>ShURLy</name><script><![CDATA[var ShURLy = Class.create();
ShURLy.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	setShortURL: function() {
		var longurl = this.getParameter('sysparm_longurl');  
		var instance_url = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri');

		// generate the shrunk URL
		var url_id = this._createRandomString(0);	

		/*
		You'll probably not want to use the "nrvsw" namespace. Normally,
		the scripted REST base URI path would have a company code but dev instances
		have ugly namespaces.  If it causes problems, something like the code below might
		be used to include the company code:

		var company_code = gs.getProperty('glide.appcreator.company.code');
		var shorturl = 'api/' + company_code + 'shurly/' + url_id;

		You can change the namespace with a script. For example:

		var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ws_definition');
		gr.get('xyzpdq');
		gr.namespace = 'your_company_code';
		gr.update();
		*/

		var shorturl = 'api/nrvsw/shurly/' + url_id;

		var sysid = this._addURL(url_id, longurl.replace(instance_url, ''));

		if (sysid) {
			return instance_url  + shorturl;
		}

		return false;
	},

	_addURL: function(url_id, longurl) {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_short_url_mapping');
		gr.addQuery('u_url_id', url_id);
		gr.query();

		if (!gr.next()) {
			gr.initialize();
			gr.u_long_url = '/' + longurl;
			gr.u_url_id = url_id;
			var sysid = gr.insert();

			return (sysid) ? sysid : false;
		}

		return false;	
	},

	_createRandomString: function(count) {
		var size = 4;
		var max_count = 20;

		// we don't want this to recurse indefinitely...
		if (count >= max_count) {
			// not handingling this at the moment....hopefully won't get this far
			return 'FAILED_CREATING_RANDOM_STRING';				
		}

		var chars = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz';
		var random_string = '';

		for (var i=0; i<size; i++) {
			random_string += chars[Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length)];
		}

		// make sure it doesn't already exist
		var gr = new GlideRecord('u_short_url_mapping');
		if (gr.get('u_url_id', random_string)) {
			this._createRandomString(++count);
		}
		else {
			return random_string;
		}	
	},

	type: 'ShURLy'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nervoussow</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-05-23 21:23:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>1eaec8b52fd03010732c4ae72799b691</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ShURLy</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ShURLy" source="4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ShURLy">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1eaec8b52fd03010732c4ae72799b691</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nervoussow</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-04 22:55:53</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_f6af44392fd03010732c4ae72799b6f3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>GET - Redirect</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var url_id = request.pathParams.url_id;

	var gr = new GlideRecord('u_short_url_mapping');
	gr.addQuery('u_url_id', url_id);
	gr.setLimit(1);
	gr.query();

	if (gr.next()) {
		var hits = parseInt(gr.getValue('u_hits'));
		gr.setValue('u_hits', ++hits);
		gr.update();
		
		// set permanent redirect for location header
		response.setStatus(301);		
		response.setLocation(gr.u_long_url);
	}
	else {
		response.setStatus(301);
		response.setLocation('/not_found.do');		
	}

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/nrvsw/shurly/{url_id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/{url_id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>false</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nervoussow</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-05-23 21:27:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>f6af44392fd03010732c4ae72799b6f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GET - Redirect</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ShURLy" source="4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ShURLy">4dfac4b12fd03010732c4ae72799b6b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_f6af44392fd03010732c4ae72799b6f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nervoussow</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-04 19:52:29</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ShURLy">b55fc0392fd03010732c4ae72799b68b</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
